thread.section_title: Ampere Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent service
thread.title_full: Excellent service - Review of Ampere Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: goranuk
title: Excellent service
text:
Returned last night from 2 nights stay at the Ampere. Excellent location, clean, friendly staff. Paid extra for a junior suite and it was worth it every cent. Having a private balcony made a such fantastic experience. This was not my first visit to Paris but now I already know where I will be staying when I come back next time, Ampere, of course.
Room Tip: If you can afford it, go for a junior suite. See more room tips
